Posts.Content: It has been almost 3 years since I had my chemo. It has taken me a long time for me to grow my hair back.Â  My hair has grown a few inches on the back of my head, but the front of my head look almost bald. How can I grow all of my hair back. Please help me. I am very depressed about my hair. Thank you.
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
